name: Hidden objects Play peek a boo
name_original: Hidden objects Play peek a boo
description:
Play Peek A Boo - Toddler Treasure

Play Peek A Boo - Toddler Treasure is an awesome game for kids. Kids have to choose an object from the list of objects shown in the slider bar and identify it in the jumbled objects.

This is designed to improve the observation skills of the young minds. It takes great observation skill to identify the right match from the jumbled objects. The hints come handy for these little minds when they are struggling.

Game features:

Kids can learn from these list of images:

* Animals
* Fruits
* Vehicles
* Alphabets
* Vegetables
* Numbers
